data.title: Randy Quaid Legal
data.meta_description: Quaid had legal problems, including an arrest in 2009 for using an invalid credit card at a Santa Barbara hotel. He is also a supporter of former President Donald Trump. The Quaids are wanted in Santa Barbara, California, for crimes filed in 2010 after squatting a guest house out of a home they previously owned. …
data.text:
Quaid had legal problems, including an arrest in 2009 for using an invalid credit card at a Santa Barbara hotel. He is also a supporter of former President Donald Trump. The Quaids are wanted in Santa Barbara, California, for crimes filed in 2010 after squatting a guest house out of a home they previously owned. He and Evi were first arrested in 2009 for leaving a hotel in Santa Barbara, California, without paying.
